name: pm2-cluster-cache
description: pm2 cluster memory cache with ttl and more possibilities of data store in cluster

scripts.test: cd test && npm install && npm run test
scripts.test-self: cd test && npm install && npm run self
scripts.test-cluster: cd test && npm install && npm run cluster
scripts.test-master: cd test && npm install && npm run master
scripts.test-all: cd test && npm install && npm run all
